alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Inland Kenedy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 14 at 2:41PM CDT until June 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 1 PM CDT THURSDAY... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the first Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 115. For the second Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 112 expected. For the first Excessive Heat Watch, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 117 possible. For the third Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 114 expected. For the second Excessive Heat Watch, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 119 possible. * WHERE...Hidalgo, Brooks, Inland Kenedy, and Starr Counties. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, until 8 PM CDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from noon to 1 PM CDT Thursday. For the first Excessive Heat Watch, from Thursday afternoon through Thursday evening. For the third Heat Advisory, from 7 PM to 8 PM CDT Thursday. For the second Excessive Heat Watch, from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat and humidity will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Inland Kenedy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr
